code: import axios from"axios";import{useCallback,useState}from"react";import{useMessage}from"./useMessage";import{EmployeeNameState,EmployeeFullNameState,EmployeeHobbiesState,EmployeeImageState}from"../contexts/EmployeeState";import{useRecoilState}from"recoil";export const useEmployee=()=>{const{showMessage}=useMessage();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);const[employee,setEmployee]=useState();const[employeeNameState,setEmployeeNameState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeNameState);const[employeeFullNameState,setEmployeeFullNameState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeFullNameState);const[employeeHobbiesState,setEmployeeHobbiesState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeHobbiesState);const[employeeImageState,setEmployeeImageState]=useRecoilState(EmployeeImageState);const getEmployee=useCallback(async props=>{const{employeeId}=props;console.log("従業員情報取得開始");setLoading(true);await axios.get("/api/employee",{params:{id:employeeId}}).then(res=>{console.log(res);setEmployee(res.data);setEmployeeNameState(res.data.employeeName);setEmployeeFullNameState(res.data.employeeFullName);setEmployeeHobbiesState(res.data.hobbies);setEmployeeImageState(res.data.image);}).catch(e=>{console.log(e);showMessage({title:"従業員情報の取得に失敗しました",status:"error"});}).finally(()=>{setLoading(false);});},[]);return{getEmployee,employee,loading};};
